columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the cloudtrail channel.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a channel.

columns.name: apply_to_all_regions
columns.description: Specifies whether the channel applies to a single region or to all regions.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The event source for the cloudtrail channel.

columns.name: advanced_event_selectors
columns.description: The advanced event selectors that are configured for the channel.

columns.name: destinations
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services service that created the service-linked channel.
